name: Schrodinger's House
description:
Schrodinger has entrusted you with looking after his house and prized twin cats. These naughty creatures dislike anyone who is not their master and will attempt to get you fired by means of destroying the Professor's prized tea cups.

Stop those pesky felines by spraying them with your trusty water bottle and show them who's boss. Beware, however, as too many destroyed teacups will result in a swift and brutal job dismissal.
